channel.title: google drive on Sharmila Upadhyaya
channel.description: Recent content in google drive on Sharmila Upadhyaya

item.title: Loading Dataset into Google Collaboration using different way
item.description: Google collab provides an ubiquitous platform for all of us, with different hardware selection (CPU, GPU and TPU) band 12 GB of RAM (25 GB if your session crashes. I sometimes willingly crash the collab with some sample of code so that I will get 25 GB of ram for that particular session). At least in the case of training any model, I, personally prefer google collab to build and train my model.
